verbs.description: Thanks to Israeli intelligence , [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: just] [V: got] [ARG2: lucky on Iran] . But how will he use the windfall ?
Thanks to Israeli intelligence , Trump just got lucky on Iran . But how [V: will] he use the windfall ?
Thanks to Israeli intelligence , Trump just got lucky on Iran . But [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARG0: he] [V: use] [ARG1: the windfall] ?
